next.name: Grounds for Laziness and Arousing Energy

segments.pli: “Aṭṭhime, bhikkhave, dhammā sekhassa bhikkhuno parihānāya saṃvattanti.
segments.en: “These eight things lead to the decline of a mendicant trainee.

segments.pli: Kammārāmatā, bhassārāmatā, niddārāmatā, saṅgaṇikārāmatā, indriyesu aguttadvāratā, bhojane amattaññutā, saṃsaggārāmatā, papañcārāmatā—
segments.en: They relish work, talk, sleep, and company. They don’t guard the sense doors and they eat too much. They relish closeness and proliferation.

segments.pli: ime kho, bhikkhave, aṭṭha dhammā sekhassa bhikkhuno parihānāya saṃvattanti.
segments.en: These eight things lead to the decline of a mendicant trainee.

segments.pli: Aṭṭhime, bhikkhave, dhammā sekhassa bhikkhuno aparihānāya saṃvattanti.
segments.en: These eight things don’t lead to the decline of a mendicant trainee.

segments.pli: Na kammārāmatā, na bhassārāmatā, na niddārāmatā, na saṅgaṇikārāmatā, indriyesu guttadvāratā, bhojane mattaññutā, asaṃsaggārāmatā, nippapañcārāmatā—
segments.en: They don’t relish work, talk, and sleep. They guard the sense doors, and they don’t eat too much. They don’t relish closeness and proliferation.

segments.pli: ime kho, bhikkhave, aṭṭha dhammā sekhassa bhikkhuno aparihānāya saṃvattantī”ti.
segments.en: These eight things don’t lead to the decline of a mendicant trainee.”
